EmailTemplate.name: Follow up from MBO Partners (1316011434.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow up from MBO Partners (1316011434.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Tanya,
You had recently shared your information with MBO Partners, and as a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on the voicemail I left you. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I am including my contact information. And, so you may easily book a time that is convenient for you, I am including a link to my online schedule: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
You can also watch a short video about who we are on youtube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1.
I look forward to speaking with you.
Have a great day!
Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
